note.p: Career: Professor of Physics, McGill University, Montreal, Canada; Loomis, Sterling, National, International Research Fellowships (Copenhagen)
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1966 vol 12 pp 147-161, plate, by R E Bell
References: D C Martin, 'Visit by the Assistant Secretary to some North American Scientific Institutions' in NR 1952 vol 9 pp 356-364
